sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得他和蔼可亲，富有魅力。

sentence.Network_en: His amiability condemns him to being a constant advisor to other people's troubles.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那和蔼可亲的性格使他成为经常为他人排忧解难的开导者.

sentence.Network_en: I watched my master's face pass from amiability to sternness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我瞧着老师的脸上从和蔼变成严峻.

entry.def: Amiability is the quality of being friendly and pleasant.

example.tran: 我觉得他和蔼可亲，富有魅力。

means.word_mean: 2. a disposition to be friendly and approachable (easy to talk to)
